articles.author: Edgar Sandoval
articles.title: 14-Year-Old Detained in Killing of Tessa Majors, Barnard Student
articles.description: He is believed to have wielded the knife that killed her, the police said.
articles.content:
A 14-year-old was detained in the Bronx on Thursday in the killing of Tessa Majors, the Barnard College student who was stabbed in a park near campus during what was apparently a botched mugging.
The police had been searching for the teenager since the day a… [+310 chars]
